events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and are beginning the review process.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to relevant keywords such as software developer and engineering experience.
A recruiter with technical background has been assigned to the candidateâ€™s profile to handle the interview scheduling and follow-up.
Initial screening call conducted where the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in software development and system design.
Candidate responded promptly to scheduling requests and expressed enthusiasm for the technical interview phase.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate next week to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
